fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource

Interface IDownloadFinishedListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UltraGallery.UltraGalleryAdapter

    public interface IDownloadFinishedListener
    Interface to get callbacks from ResourceManager after new file has been downloaded.
    Author:
    Olgierd Uzieblo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isDownloadCancelled(DownloadTask pTask)
      Called while download is starting/finishing to check if it should be cancelled.
      void onDownloadingFinished()
      Method called by ResourceManager when all downloading tasks have finished.
      void onDownloadTaskFailed(DownloadTask pTask)
      Method called by DownloadTask once it failed miserably.
      void onDownloadTaskSuccessful(DownloadTask pTask)
      Method called by DownloadTask once it finished and was saved successfully.

    • Method Detail

      • isDownloadCancelled

        boolean isDownloadCancelled(DownloadTask pTask)
        Called while download is starting/finishing to check if it should be cancelled. First call is made just before opening connection. Next calls are made while downloading and just before saving file.
        Parameters:
        pTask - Task that is being started/downloaded/finished.
        Returns:
        False to continue downloading this task. True to cancel it.

      • onDownloadingFinished

        void onDownloadingFinished()
        Method called by ResourceManager when all downloading tasks have finished.

      • onDownloadTaskSuccessful

        void onDownloadTaskSuccessful(DownloadTask pTask)
        Method called by DownloadTask once it finished and was saved successfully.

      • onDownloadTaskFailed

        void onDownloadTaskFailed(DownloadTask pTask)
        Method called by DownloadTask once it failed miserably.
